issues_found: Potential clutter in the hero section with multiple elements competing for attention

The torn paper divider may not provide a clear visual separation between sections
The experience cards section could benefit from clearer categorization or filtering options
The site's color scheme, while visually appealing, may not provide sufficient contrast for all users
The use of irregular edges and clip-path polygons may cause issues with screen readers or other assistive technologies
recommendations: Simplify the hero section by focusing on a single, clear call-to-action

Add filtering or categorization options to the experience cards section to improve discoverability
Consider adding a high contrast mode or option to improve accessibility
Ensure that all interactive elements, such as buttons and links, have a clear and consistent design and behavior
mobile_fixes: Ensure that the Polaroid cards are easily tappable on mobile devices, with a minimum size of 48x48 pixels
Use a mobile-friendly font size and line spacing to improve readability
Consider using a simpler navigation menu or hamburger icon to reduce clutter
Optimize images and other media to reduce load times on mobile devices
Ensure that the site's layout and design adapt properly to different screen sizes and orientations
accessibility_issues: Insufficient contrast between the background and text colors, potentially causing issues for users with visual impairments
The use of clip-path polygons and irregular edges may cause issues with screen readers or other assistive technologies
The site may not be fully navigable using a keyboard, potentially causing issues for users with mobility impairments
The site may not provide alternative text for images, potentially causing issues for users with visual impairments
The site may not provide a clear and consistent layout, potentially causing issues for users with cognitive or learning disabilities
